title: The Ethics of Belief
creator: William Kingdon Clifford
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of The Ethics of Belief, by William Kingdon Clifford. This is an essay on decision biases and a critique on prejudices, neatly written and thought provoking. (Summary by sidhu177) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. Download M4B (30MB)
subject: Philosophy; ethics; advice; essay; nonfiction; Librivox; audiobook
